moves.1. e4 e5 2. Qf3: Queen develops in opening, not so good
moves.3... Bc5 4. Qh5+ g6 5. Qf3 d6 6. a3: B4 attacks bishop, I don't like these moves, queenside castling is bad
moves.14. Qxg6+ Kd8 15. Ng5 Bxe3: Castling on white is not that good, black queenside is ok
moves.17. Kd2 Bh4 18. Be6 Bxe6: Fork with king and rook! Or you lose a queen
moves.21... Bxg3 22. hxg3 Rf8: Rook  and king fork on Nxe6
moves.23. a4 Bg4 24. Qh4: C'mon do the fork, or attack the bishop
